Class CombatViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • zlibrary.ZComponent
      • zlibrary.ZImage
        • zlibrary.ZContainer
          • gui.CombatViewer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ZDrawable

    public class CombatViewer
extends ZContainer
implements ZDrawable
    Sets up and holds all gui elements to the combat frame
    Since:
    2015-02-21
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andreas Backevik

    • Constructor Detail

      • CombatViewer

        public CombatViewer(java.util.List<ZEntity> entities,
                    EventAdder eventAdder,
                    Playable players,
                    Encounter e)
        The constructor initializes all necessary information for the combat GUI to work uniquely for each fight. And adds all GUI elements.
        Parameters:
        entities - copy of entity list, to add components
        eventAdder - reference to the event queue
        players - list with playable characters.
        e - the specific encounter for this combat that includes enemies

    • Method Detail

      • spellMenu

        public void spellMenu()
        Opens spell menu with dynamically loaded spells from players spellbook to show in the GUI

      • updateVisuals
